name: Nightmares (itch) (alshahreyaj)
description:
Dreams can be sweet, can be horrible, and we call them nightmares. Let me introduce you to Emily. She only has nightmares. The most horrible part is that she can't get out of her dreams. The only way of getting out of her dreams is to die. That's why, to awake she has to suicide on her dreams. Can you help her to get out of these nightmares.

Assest Used:

Character used from Mixamo.
